hero.subtitle: A premier gathering of blockchain innovators featuring talks from Ethereum's leading minds in the beautiful setting of Florian√≥polis.

subtitle.intro: Our goal is to explore the Ethereum ecosystem through different lenses:
subtitle.audience: Whether you develop, research, invest, or are simply curious about Web3's potential, this event is for you.
subtitle.hackathon: Plus an intensive Starknet hackathon where developers compete for **R$ 15,000 in prizes** building the future of decentralized applications.

hackathon.title: Starknet Hackathon
hackathon.prizeSubtitle: in prizes for the best projects

features.scalability: Unlock massive scalability for your dApps on Ethereum.
features.cairo: Build provable and secure applications with the Cairo language.
features.layer2: Benefit from the security of Ethereum with lower transaction costs.
features.ecosystem: Join a vibrant and rapidly growing developer ecosystem.

details.title: Hackathon Details
details.prizes: R$ 15,000 in prizes for the best projects

hackathon.dateToBeAnnouncedDesc: The hackathon date will be revealed soon. Stay tuned for updates!
hackathon.starknet_intro: Starknet is a revolutionary ZK-Rollup that provides massive scalability to Ethereum, without sacrificing security. By building on Starknet, you are at the forefront of blockchain innovation. Join our hackathon and build the future of decentralized applications.
hackathon.zk_rollups_desc: ZK-Rollups are Layer 2 scaling solutions that bundle hundreds of transactions into a single one on the main Ethereum chain. This drastically reduces gas fees and increases throughput, making dApps more efficient and affordable.
hackathon.zk_proofs_desc: Zero-Knowledge Proofs allow for the verification of a statement's truth without revealing the statement itself. In blockchain, this means enhanced privacy and security, as transactions can be validated without exposing sensitive data.
hackathon.starknet_description: ZK-Rollup Layer 2 for Ethereum with massive scalability and zero-knowledge proofs
hackathon.cairo_description: Native language for Starknet smart contracts, optimized for STARK proofs
hackathon.cairo_coder_description: AI for Cairo code generation with IDE/CLI support to accelerate development
hackathon.ceo_insights: Direct insights from the CEO of Starknet
hackathon.rules_agenda_desc: Detailed rules, judging criteria, and the full hackathon schedule will be published soon. Stay tuned!

defi.title: DeFi Summer
defi.description: Explore the renaissance of decentralized finance, innovative protocols and emerging opportunities in the DeFi ecosystem.

daos.title: DAOs and their risks
daos.description: Understand the future of decentralized governance and how DAOs are revolutionizing collective organization.

marketing.title: Crypto Marketing
marketing.description: Strategies to promote blockchain projects, build communities and navigate the regulatory landscape.

security.title: Crypto Security
security.description: Learn about vulnerabilities, historical attacks and best practices for building secure systems.

l2s.title: Layer2s and Sidechains
l2s.description: Connect different blockchains and explore interoperability solutions that unite the multi-chain ecosystem.

ai.title: AI
ai.description: Discover how artificial intelligence is being integrated with blockchain to create new possibilities.

oracles.title: Oracles
oracles.description: Explore how blockchain oracles bridge the gap between on-chain and off-chain data, enabling smart contracts to interact with real-world information.

network_societies.title: Network Societies
network_societies.description: Understand how decentralized networks are reshaping social structures and creating new forms of digital governance and community organization.

and_more.title: And More...
and_more.description: Additional topics and surprise speakers to be announced soon!
